summary: THE CAR HAS STARTING ISSUES WHEN WE WERE BUYING THE CAR AT 16500 MILES FULL WARRANTY THE CAR HAD ISSUES STARTING  BEFORE WE DID BUY IT WE WERE TOLD THE CAR WAS FIXED  WE WERE DRIVING THE CAR FROM  FLORIDA TO MICHIGAN ON OUR FIRST STOP THE CAR WOULD NOT START  WE STARTED TO LOOK THRU THE MANUAL AND FOUND WRITTEN IN HANDWRITING  A LIST OF STEPS TO FOLLOW ON GETTING THE CAR TO START  WE DID THIS AND THE CAR DID START   OF COURSE THIS WAS NOT THE END OF THE PROBLEM WE HAVE HAD THE CAR TO CADILLAC DEALERSHIP WITH NUMEROUS TRIES TO FIX THE PROBLEM THE DEALERSHIP HAS BEEN IN CONTACT WITH CADILLAC BUT WITH NO CURE FOR THIS PROBLEM  HOW LONG DO I HAVE TO WAIT FOR LEMON LAW STATUES THANKS
